Dearborn.Assumption College School:
Assumption College Catholic High School is an International Baccalaureate authorized Catholic high school in Windsor, Ontario.


== History ==
Assumption was founded by the Basilian Fathers in 1870 as part of Assumption University, which is now part of the University of Windsor. Assumption was at first a private boarding school for male students only, but later took in day students and in 1971, with the merging of St.
